pages.text: Death in $(thing)Crucial$() works in a slightly different manner from vanilla.$(br2)Should you die, a $(item)Totem of Holding$() will spawn in your deathbed, and will hold any items you were carrying on you. If you manage to reach the totem without dying again, simply whack it a few times to get your stuff back.

Be aware, however, that if you die on the way to collecting your items, they will all fall to the ground!$(br2)Chances are, by the time you're reading this, you can't make one yet, but a $(item)Soul Compass$() will point to where you last died, should you need it.$(br2)Lastly, holding the $(item)$(k:playerlist)$() key will show the amount of deaths of the players in your world, right next to their names. (yes, even in singleplayer)
